attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1412: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean · vim/vim@6e4cfff
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1412: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean · vim/vim@6e4cfff
attachments.text: Problem: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean. Solution: Make type depend on operator. (issue 6678) Fix using "false" and "true" in Vim9 script.

text: この評価はVim9 scirptでいれるということらしいです。

<https://github.com/vim/vim/pull/6678>
`!v:true` の件、気になるから投げてみた。テストとかなかったし考慮してなかった感ある

attachments.fallback: GitHub: logical NOT of v:true and v:false should make a value of bool. by rbtnn · Pull Request #6678 · vim/vim
attachments.title: logical NOT of v:true and v:false should make a value of bool. by rbtnn · Pull Request #6678 · vim/vim
attachments.text: Current Vim script is that logical NOT of v:true and v:false make a value of number: !v:true -> 0 !v:false -> 1 I think that logical NOT of v:true and v:false should make a value of bool: !v...
